t24:applications.name: SEC_OPEN_ORDER
t24:applications.t24:allowed-functions: A B C D E H I L P Q R S V

t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Indicates the security code/number
Indicates the date the Portfolios will be updated by the event
Indicates the Maturity Date of the Transaction
Indicates whether it is a Buy or Sell Order
Identifies the currency of the transaction
Identifies the Customer for the transaction.
Indicates the Portfolio Account of the customer
Customer charges to be calculated or not
Adjust commission to match trade and cash amount
Any narrative to be input for user information
Identifies the customer account
Amount of Broker Commission charged to customer
Foreign Fee amount charged to the Customer
Stamp Tax amount charged to the Customer
Amount of EBV Fees charged to the Customer
Indicates the customer miscellaneous fees
Customer discount applied to CU.NET.AM.TRD
Indicates the customer discount amount
Securities Tax up to the Value Date of the trade
Indicates the commission code
Indicates the commission tax code
Indicates the local currencuy of commission tax
Indicates the commission Tax Exchange Rate
Price at which the shares are to be bought or sold
Indicates the Limit Type
Specifies the validity of the Limit
Depository the Security to be delivered from/to
Identifies the Nominee Company
Narration associated with the Account Officer
Time of Order placement with Broker/Counterparty
Specifies amount of an order placed with Broker
Holds the Broker execution price
Indicates the broker type
Broker Account to post financial entries
Indicates the currency of the Broker Account
Exchange rate between Trade and Broker Account Ccy
The delivery instruction to broker
Actual amount traded for any particular order
IDs of the delivery records related to transaction
Identifies the transaction type on broker side
Unique reference which identifies the transaction
Identifies the Customer for the transaction.
Indicates the Portfolio Account of the customer
Used when Security open Order is partially filled
Indicate the time trade was executed
Indicates in which market the Trade has been dealt
Indicates the status of the deal
Indicates the deal Narrative
Order value in Settlement Currency
Additional information defined locally
Indicates the group order
Indicates if order is an odd lot order or not
Indicates activity code
Transmission of the advice
Holds the thread Key for service based orders
Overrides generated by this transaction
The user who last updated the record
Date and time when record was input or authorised
Indicates the User who Authorises the record
Auditor Code
Date and time when record was audited
Indicates the asset type
